metadata.title: CVE-2018-17475 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
Incorrect handling of history on iOS in Navigation in Google Chrome priorto 70.0.3538.67 allowed a remote attacker to spoof the contents of theOmnibox (URL bar) via a crafted HTML page.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-17475` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

chromium-browser - 70.0.3538.67-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
chromium-browser-l10n - 70.0.3538.67-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
chromium-chromedriver - 70.0.3538.67-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
chromium-codecs-ffmpeg - 70.0.3538.67-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
chromium-codecs-ffmpeg-extra - 70.0.3538.67-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: chromium-browser package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '70.0.3538.67-0ubuntu0.18.04.1').
